channel.title: Hacked account with proof
channel.description:
since mopar is not answering my pms i thought i would post it to get his attention
[quote="dds barrahe"]Hello My main acccount on moparscape has been taken from me http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=546488 (reason is because i had a friend verifiy the account with his email and he has control over it now)
You can check the ips i was on for whole time he has taken it because he wanted the mopar spot on the status list which has 22k votes
his forum account name is http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=446251 me and him parted ways after i quit working with him
i now run a new server and he has taken my account along with my best advertisment.
Please reply asap! thanks
PROOF
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1Hqj3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/putvF.png[/img]
he claims he owns it now since i sold him my website and server. any more proof please just ask i[/quote]

item.title: Hacked account with proof
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s funny because his registered IP address matches the account’s registered IP address, and yours does not.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked account with proof
item.dc:creator: @dds_barrahe dds barrahe
item.description:
@dds_barrahe wrote:

your an idiot im the original owner of the account stop posting dumb shit it was registered with his email because i asked him if i could use his since i did not have any more emails

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked account with proof
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

dds barrahe:

main reason i want it back is because of the 22k votes it has on mopar. that was my main source of advertisment.

And the votes were probably abused with a program.

EDIT: Or, you’re not the owner of it but you want the advertisement spot so you can get more players to your shitty server.

Read full topic

item.title: Hacked account with proof
item.dc:creator: @Skyru Skyru
item.description:
@Skyru wrote:

I see why Mopar isn’t responding.

Your ‘main’ account:

Posts: 1 (0.006 per day)
Rep: 10
Age:N/A
Date Registered: September 13, 2011, 06:04:08 PM
Local Time:March 13, 2012, 05:46:28 PM
Last Active: March 11, 2012, 03:40:45 PM

You have many things to take into consideration when it comes to Mopar not responding right away.

Read full topic
